name: Fan mail to instructor
description: Personal appreciation message for Matt - should route silently

trigger.subject: Thank you Matt!
trigger.body:
Hi Matt,

I just wanted to say thank you. Your Total TypeScript course completely changed my career. I went from struggling with any types to actually understanding the type system. I just got a new job as a senior developer and your course was a huge part of that.

You're awesome!

Thanks,
John
